name: ChainAware.ai
description: ChainAware.ai is the Web3 AI Agents Company. ChainAware.ai predicts wallet and contract behavior with predictive AI and Analytics engines. These calculations are monetized for predictive fraud detection, predictive rug pull detector, and Web3 AdTech / Web3 Marketing. ChainAware.ai offers for businesses: Web3 Marketing Agents—These agents predict the wallets' next actions/intentions/behavior and generate 1:1 targeting content based on these intentions. This results in 4x-8x better user acquisition rates. Transaction Monitoring Agents: These agents use predictive AI to monitor a given set of addresses. These agents allow for an increase in trust in the Web3 ecosystem. Web3 User Analytics - it is free for any Web3 business to analyze the intentions of their user base. ChainAware.ai offers regular users: Predictive Fraud Detector—predicts fraud in the future via our predictive AI models. It is real-time and accurate, with a 98% prediction accuracy. Predictive Rug Pull Detector - predicts rug pulls in the future. Credit Score - predicts users' credit score for the borrowing .Wallet Auditing - use it before transacting with other wallets Major Milestones and Key Highlights: We launched in ChainAware.ai 4 Web3 B2B products We launched in ChainAware.ai 5 Web3 B2C products We keep adding more functionality to the existing products now We launched free Web3 User Analytics We continuously add more blockchains Led by a team of blockchain and AI experts Backed by ChainGPT, Coinix, and partnered with SmartCredit, Haqq Network, and more (20+ companies)
